title: Notify Customers of Critical Peak Pricing Event
description: Due to extreme heat and high demand, the utility is calling a Critical Peak Pricing (CPP) event for the next day, where electricity prices will be much higher for a few hours.

tasks.description: Identify all customers enrolled in the CPP rate plan.
tasks.expected_outcome: System generates a list of all CPP customers.

tasks.description: Send a day-ahead notification to these customers via their preferred method (email, text, phone call) about the event timing and prices.
tasks.expected_outcome: System successfully sends the CPP event notifications.

tasks.description: Include tips on how to reduce energy use during the event to save money.
tasks.expected_outcome: The notification includes actionable conservation advice.
